channel.title: The "ROCK" Show
channel.description: Enosh Fee and Mike Beer host SPAZZradio.com's Sunday evening morning show. Always a relevant topic from a Christian perspective with secular Rock & Roll music as a backdrop. Curious? So are we, so join in the fun with us.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Talk / Humor / Music and much more
channel.itunes:author: The "ROCK" Show

item.title: THE ROCK SHOW - Vampires are taking over the world!!!!
item.description: In the words of the great Jerry Sienfeld, "What's the deal with all these vampires?" Who are these vampires? Vampires are everywhere! No literally.....everywhere. Some are scary, some cheesy, some are even sparkly. What's up with all this love for the undead lately? What does it say about the world? Have we all lost our minds? There are 4 different vampire series in the top ten of all books sold. That and a gooey jump into "The Nosh Pit" Enjoy this older episode of The Rock show that never made the Podcast. (Simply because I never got around to it.)
item.dc:creator: The "ROCK" Show
item.itunes:summary:
In the words of the great Jerry Sienfeld, "What's the deal with all these vampires?" Who are these vampires?
Vampires are everywhere! No literally.....everywhere. Some are scary, some cheesy, some are even sparkly. What's up with all this love for the undead lately? What does it say about the world? Have we all lost our minds? There are 4 different vampire series in the top ten of all books sold.
That and a gooey jump into "The Nosh Pit"
Enjoy this older episode of The Rock show that never made the Podcast. (Simply because I never got around to it.)

item.title: The Rock Show - Civic Pride (Should we put a Robo Cop Statue in Detroit?)
item.description: Sometimes you just can't make this stuff up folks. Mayor Dave Bing's plan for a New Detroit does not include a RoboCop statue. In an attempt to engage the community, Bing and his communications team have been responding to queries on the mayor's official Twitter account. Monday, one Twitter user humorously asked Bing to consider erecting a statue of RoboCop to recognize the city's relationship to to the 1987 sci-fi film. "Philadelphia has a statue of Rocky & Robocop would kick Rocky's butt," one person tweeted "He's a GREAT ambassador for Detroit." Whether he was in on the joke or not, @mayordavebing responded: "There are not any plans to erect a statue to Robocop. Thank you for the suggestion." Local residents and fans of the film retweeted the exchange and now an organization has been set up to raise over $50,000 to build the statue without the city's official help. How do you help your City? What instills pride in you in where you live? How has history made your hometown what it is today. Should be a fun one.
item.dc:creator: The "ROCK" Show
item.itunes:summary:
Sometimes you just can't make this stuff up folks.
Mayor Dave Bing's plan for a New Detroit does not include a RoboCop statue.
In an attempt to engage the community, Bing and his communications team have been responding to queries on the mayor's official Twitter account.
Monday, one Twitter user humorously asked Bing to consider erecting a statue of RoboCop to recognize the city's relationship to to the 1987 sci-fi film.
"Philadelphia has a statue of Rocky & Robocop would kick Rocky's butt," one person tweeted "He's a GREAT ambassador for Detroit."
Whether he was in on the joke or not, @mayordavebing responded: "There are not any plans to erect a statue to Robocop. Thank you for the suggestion."
Local residents and fans of the film retweeted the exchange and now an organization has been set up to raise over $50,000 to build the statue without the city's official help.
How do you help your City? What instills pride in you in where you live? How has history made your hometown what it is today. Should be a fun one.

item.title: The "Rock" Show - The End of the World!!!!
item.description: For centuries there have been people and organizations predicting the return of Jesus and the end of the world. That tradition has continued even until now where we have well published groups that predicted that the world would end in May. Long story short..... It didn't happen. What is the facination with this topic? Even when proven wrong the familyradio.org people still don't admit defeat, no they just change the date. Then there's all the predictions that next year, "2012" will be the end. We had something to say about this, so we did a show about it. Enjoy! Slight warning: JRock our original host joined us for this show. He dropped a "B" word bomb on Mike. It was just once. It is what it is.

item.title: The "Rock" Show - Would you vote for a woman for President?
item.description: The world has changed tremendously over the last few decades. America used to be a mostly male dominated society where men ruled business, and politics and women took care of the children and the house. Women have made huge strides to change these opinions over the years. One way this has changed is women's role in government. There has been an increasing number of women who have run for President or vice President. The question remains, when you go into that voting booth, are you more likely to vote for a man or a woman? Does it matter to you? What are some of the questions we would have for a women candidate as opposed to her male competition? A fun episode for sure with new members of the show James McCoy and Tiffanie "Tifftastic" Austin providing a female perspective. Check it out!
item.dc:creator: The "ROCK" Show
item.itunes:summary:
The world has changed tremendously over the last few decades. America used to be a mostly male dominated society where men ruled business, and politics and women took care of the children and the house.
Women have made huge strides to change these opinions over the years. One way this has changed is women's role in government. There has been an increasing number of women who have run for President or vice President.
The question remains, when you go into that voting booth, are you more likely to vote for a man or a woman? Does it matter to you? What are some of the questions we would have for a women candidate as opposed to her male competition? A fun episode for sure with new members of the show James McCoy and Tiffanie "Tifftastic" Austin providing a female perspective.
Check it out!

item.title: THE ROCK SHOW - Bullies
item.description: A few months ago video surfaced of a kid fighting back against a bully in school. He said he had just had enough. When is enough, enough? Good topic along with a lot of fun stuff thrown in for your enjoyment.
item.dc:creator: The "ROCK" Show
item.itunes:summary: A few months ago video surfaced of a kid fighting back against a bully in school. He said he had just had enough. When is enough, enough? Good topic along with a lot of fun stuff thrown in for your enjoyment.

item.title: Christians in Show business. What makes a Christian a Christian?
item.description: According to news stories, Insane Clown Posse have this entire time secretly been evangelical Christians. They've only been pretending to be brutal and sadistic to trick their fans into believing in God. uh.......ok? Many people in Entertainment claim to be Christians. So when we see things from them that don't line up up with the Bible it can give us an occaision for pause. However, they are no different than us. Do our lives match up to what we proclaim as Christians? Do we dismiss our shortcomings because it's easier for us to conceal them?

According to news stories,

However, they are no different than us. Do our lives match up to what we proclaim as Christians? Do we dismiss our shortcomings because it's easier for us to conceal them?

item.title: THE ROCK SHOW - Halloween Rockspooktacular!!!!! Topic: Fear
item.description: Enosh and Mike are back again for another hilarious episode of The Rock Show. First up is very haunted "NOSH PIT" with scary, crazy Halloween news stories from all around the globe. Then Enosh and Mike are visited by old friends of the show trick - or- treating in the neighborhood. Finally, your frightened hosts tackle the subject of FEAR. Fear controls many people and how they live their lives. If you allow it, fear will take you over and keep you from being all you can be in life. Listen and Enjoy!
item.dc:creator: The "ROCK" Show

First up is very haunted "NOSH PIT" with scary, crazy Halloween news stories from all around the globe. Then Enosh and Mike are visited by old friends of the show trick - or- treating in the neighborhood.
Finally, your frightened hosts tackle the subject of FEAR. Fear controls many people and how they live their lives. If you allow it, fear will take you over and keep you from being all you can be in life.
Listen and Enjoy!

item.title: THE ROCK SHOW - Hero Worship
item.description: What does it mean to be a hero? Who are your heroes? Who do look up to? How does that affect your life? This and more on this episode of the Rock Show. Join us at www.spazzradio.com 9:00pm EST.
